name: When Pigs Fly (mightysuper9)
description:
When Pigs Fly is a platformer game made for Game Off 2022.

In a different reality, pigs ruled the Earth. They behaved just like humans, with high intelligence. The only thing holding them back is lack of opposable thumbs.

This is Igpay. They are an escapee from a government lab experiment called G00d Bac0n, which specialized on fusing animal DNA with pigs. With no legs and a pair of wings, Igpay must reach space to escape their tyrannical government.

With your help, Igpay can escape his planet and lead a new life up in space. The government will learn the consequences when pigs fly.
